Title: Relates to the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits; repealer
Summary: Provides three options for the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits; makes certain technical corrections.
LawCode: Amd §§490 & 502, rpld §502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits; in relation to making technical corrections to such law; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
